Map.Query: select distinct ID from Node where ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'

Property.Name: HostName
Property.Query: select distinct ID, Name from Node where ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'

Property.Name: IPAddress
Property.Query: select Node.ID, IPAddress.[Value] from Node, NodeHasIPAddress, IPAddress where Node.ID = NodeHasIPAddress.NodeID and NodeHasIPAddress.IPAddressID = IPAddress.ID and Node.ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'

Map.Query: /*select IPAddress.ID from IPAddress*/ select IPAddress.ID from Node, NodeHasIPAddress, IPAddress where Node.ID = NodeHasIPAddress.NodeID and NodeHasIPAddress.IPAddressID = IPAddress.ID and Node.ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'

Parent.Query: select IPAddress.ID, Node.ID from Node, NodeHasIPAddress, IPAddress where Node.ID = NodeHasIPAddress.NodeID and NodeHasIPAddress.IPAddressID = IPAddress.ID and Node.ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'

Property.Name: IPAddress
Property.Query: /*select IPAddress.ID, IPAddress.[Value] from IPAddress*/ select IPAddress.ID, IPAddress.[Value] from Node, NodeHasIPAddress, IPAddress where Node.ID = NodeHasIPAddress.NodeID and NodeHasIPAddress.IPAddressID = IPAddress.ID and Node.ObjectClassID = 1 and Node.Name = 'dasourwebp1'
